amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to reduce the amount authorized by the bill by approximately $37 billion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A010) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 151 - 277 (Roll no. 317).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A010) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Ms. Lee (CA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A010) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 151 - 277 (Roll no. 317).
